Class ReconnectingState

Namespace
FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.States
Assembly
FlowGraph.Avalonia.dll

State for reconnecting an existing edge by dragging its endpoint. Similar to React Flow's reconnectable edges - the edge visual updates in real-time.

public class ReconnectingState : InputStateBase, IInputState
Inheritance
object

Constructors

ReconnectingState(Edge, bool, Node, Port, Node, Port, Point, ThemeResources)

Creates a new reconnecting state.

public ReconnectingState(Edge edge, bool draggingTarget, Node fixedNode, Port fixedPort, Node movingNode, Port movingPort, Point startPosition, ThemeResources theme)

Parameters

edge Edge

The edge being reconnected.

draggingTarget bool

True if dragging the target (input) end, false if dragging the source (output) end.

fixedNode Node

The node whose connection stays fixed.

fixedPort Port

The port that stays connected.

movingNode Node

The node we're disconnecting from.

movingPort Port

The port we're disconnecting from.

startPosition Point

Initial screen position of the cursor.

theme ThemeResources

Theme resources for styling.
